trans-unit.source: Please wait, verifying and extracting scenery...
trans-unit.target: Bitte warten, Szenerie wird geprüft und entpackt...

trans-unit.source: Successfully installed the scenery files to '%1'. This location will be added to the list of additional sceneries to be used.
trans-unit.target: Szenerie erfolgreich nach '%1' installiert. Dieser Ort wird zur Liste der zusätzlich zu ladenden Szenerien hinzugefügt.

trans-unit.source:
The easiest way to automatically install scenery is to use TerraSync. If you prefer to download and install scenery manually, you can use this dialog to extract and install the files in the correct place. (Click here to download scenery)

Files will be extracted and installed to a 'Scenery' folder inside your chosen downloads location (currently %1), after which you can delete the archives if you wish.

To begin, click 'Next' and select one or more downloaded scenery archives, which have names such as 'w010n40.tar.gz'
trans-unit.target:
Am einfachsten kann Szenerie automatisch per TerraSync installiert werden. Falls der Download und die Installation manuell erfolgen soll, kann dieser Dialog benutzt werden, um manuell heruntergeladene Archiv-Dateien zu installieren. (Hier klicken für manuellen Download von Szenerie)

Die Archive werden in das Verzeichnis 'Scenery' im Download-Ordner (momentan %1) entpackt. Danach können die heruntergeladenen Archive gelöscht werden.

Klick auf 'Weiter' und wähle ein oder mehrere heruntergeladene Archive - diese sollten Namen wie z.B. 'w010n40.tar.gz' haben.

trans-unit.source: To use the files included with this copy of FlightGear, click this button
trans-unit.target: Um die mitgelieferten Dateien zu benutzen, hier klicken

trans-unit.source: To download a compressed archive of the files, click the 'Download' button. Once the download is complete, extract the files to a suitable location and choose the folder using the button above.
trans-unit.target: Um ein komprimiertes Archiv der Dateien herunterzuladen, klicke auf "Download". Nach dem Download muss das Archiv in ein geeignetes Verzeichnis entpackt werden und das Verzeichnis hier ausgewählt werden.

trans-unit.source: To browse to a downloaded copy of the files on your computer, click this button
trans-unit.target: Heruntergeladene Kopie auf diesem Rechner suchen

trans-unit.source:
The easiest way to automatically install scenery is to use TerraSync. If you prefer to download and install scenery manually, you can use this dialog to extract and install the files in the correct place. (Click here to download scenery)

Files will be extracted and installed to a 'Scenery' folder inside your chosen downloads location (currently %1), after which you can delete the archives if you wish.

To begin, click 'Next' and select one or more downloaded scenery archives, which have names such as 'w010n40.tar.gz'

alt-trans.source:
Der einfachste Weg Szenerie zu installieren, ist TerraSync. Um Szenerie manuell herunterzuladen und zu installieren, kann dieser Dialog benutzt werden, um die Dateien in das richtige Verzeichnis zu entpacken. (Für Szenerie Download hier klicken.)

Die Dateien werden in ein Verzeichnis 'Scenery' unterhalb des gewählten Download-Verzeichnisses (momentan %1) entpackt. Anschließend können die Archive gelöscht werden.

Zum Fortfahren bitte auf 'Next' klicken und ein oder mehrere heruntergeladene Szenerie-Archive auswählen. Diese haben Namen wie z.B. 'w010n40.tar.gz'

trans-unit.source: Added scenery should contain at least one of the following folders: Objects, Terrain, Buildings, Roads, Pylons, NavData.
A new release of FlightGear is available (%1): click for more information
Updated version %1 is available: click here to download
Click here to select a recently used aircraft.
Use this menu to choose the starting state of the aircraft
Click this description to view and change the current location.
Click here to access recently used locations
Click here to switch between grid and list mode
Use this tab to view installed aircraft
Use this tab to view available aircraft to download
Enter text here to search aircraft names and descriptions.
Licenced under the GNU Public License (GPL) - click for more info
Choose the starting condition of the aircraft
Click to view and change the current location.
Click here to change which aircraft are shown or hidden based on their ratings
Aircraft are rated by the community based on four critiera, on a scale from one to five. The ratings are designed to help make an informed guess how complete and functional an aircraft is.
trans-unit.target: Flugzeuge werden von der Community in vier Kategorien auf einer Skala von Eins bis Fünf bewertet. Anhand der Bewertung ist eine Auswahl nach Vollständigkeit und Funktionalität möglich.

trans-unit.source: Click here to select different variants or models of this aircraft
Toggle between grid and list view
Use this button to view installed aircraft
Enter text to search aircraft names and descriptions.
No favourite aircraft selected: install some aircraft and mark them as favourites by clicking the ★
To install additional aircraft, click the the 'Browse' tab at the top of this page.
No aircraft updates available right now
For help using this launcher, try enabling the getting started hints.

FlightGear is open source software, developed entirely by volunteers. Support is provided by our excellent user community. The easiest place to ask questions and get support is on our forums.

To get started with the simulator, please use our tutorial system: this is available from the 'Help' menu in the simulator. We recommend starting with the Cessna 172 to learn how to get airborne.

Other good resources:

  • the official manual (PDF)
  • key commands reference
  • our wiki (which includes FAQs)
If you find an issue, please use our help forum.
FlightGear is the result of twenty-five years of work by hundreds of contributors around the world. We'd be delighted if you would join us.
Click here to cycle through preview images
scenery archive name is not correct.
file does not appear to be a scenery archive.
trans-unit.target: die Datei scheint kein Szeneriearchiv zu sein.

trans-unit.source: No aircraft found in the folder '%1' - add anyway?
The folder '%1' doesn't appear to contain an addon module - add anyway?
Added modules should contain at least both of the following files: addon-metadata.xml, addon-main.nas.
The folder '%1' doesn't appear to contain scenery - add anyway?
Added scenery should contain at least one of the following folders: Objects, Terrain, Buildings, Roads, Pylons, NavData, Airports.
Select state based on startup position.
Failed to find a hangar description at the URL: '%1'. Check you entered the URL correctly.
trans-unit.target: Hangarbeschreibung nicht gefunden, bitte URL prüfe (%1).

trans-unit.source: Access to the hangar data was forbidden by the server. Please check the URL you entered, or contact the hangar authors.
trans-unit.target: Zugriff auf Hangar verweigert. Bitte URL prüfen oder den Administrator des Hangars kontaktieren.

trans-unit.source: Failed to download from the server due to a network problem. Check your Internet connection is working, and that you entered the correct URL.
trans-unit.target: Download fehlgeschlagen (Netzwerkfehler). Bitte URL und Internetverbindung prüfen.

trans-unit.source: The hangar you requested is for a different version of FlightGear. (This is version %1)
trans-unit.target: Der angeforderte Hangar ist für eine andere Version von FlightGear. (Diese Version ist %1)

trans-unit.source: The requested hangar seems to be invalid (damaged or incomplete). Please contact the hangar authors, or try again later
trans-unit.target: Der angeforderte Hangar scheint unvollständig oder beschädigt zu sein. Bitte später erneut versuchen oder den Administrator des Hangars kontaktieren

trans-unit.source: Click here to add a new aircraft hangar. (Note this requires an Internet connection)
trans-unit.target: Hier klicken, um neuen Hangar hinzuzufügen. (Benötigt eine Internetverbindung)

trans-unit.source: Enter a hangar location (URL) to add.
There was a problem adding the hangar: %1.
trans-unit.target: Es gab ein Problem beim Hinzufügen des Hangars: %1.

trans-unit.source: Aircraft hangars are managed collections of aircraft, which can be downloaded, installed and updated inside FlightGear.
trans-unit.target: Flugzeughangars sind Sammlungen von Flugzeugen, die in FlightGear heruntergeladen, installiert und aktualisiert werden können.

trans-unit.source: The official FlightGear aircraft hangar is not set up. To add it, click here.
trans-unit.target: Der offizielle FlightGear Hangar ist nicht eingerichtet. Zum Hinzufügen hier klicken.

trans-unit.source: To use aircraft you download yourself, FlightGear needs to know the folder(s) containing the aircraft data.
trans-unit.target: Um manuell heruntergeladene Flugzeuge zu nutzen, muss FlightGear deren Verzeichnis(se) kennen.

trans-unit.source: Remove the aircraft folder: '%1' from the list? (The folder contents will not be changed)
trans-unit.target: Verzeichnis '%1' aus Liste entfernen? (Der Inhalt des Verzeichnisses wird nicht geändert)

trans-unit.source: No custom aircraft paths are configured.
trans-unit.target: Es sind keine benutzerdefinierten Flugzeug-Verzeichnisse konfiguriert.

trans-unit.source: To use Add-on Modules that you download yourself, FlightGear needs to know the folder(s) containing the Add-on Modules.
trans-unit.target: Um manuell heruntergeladene Add-ons zu nutzen, muss FlightGear deren Verzeichnis(se) kennen.

trans-unit.source: Remove the add-on module folder: '%1' from the list? (The folder contents will not be changed)
trans-unit.target: Verzeichnis '%1' aus Liste entfernen? (Der Inhalt des Verzeichnisses wird nicht geändert)

trans-unit.source: No custom add-on module paths are configured.
trans-unit.target: Es sind keine benutzerdefinierten Add-on-Verzeichnisse konfiguriert.

trans-unit.source: To use scenery you download yourself, FlightGear needs to know the folders containing the scenery data. Adjust the order of the list to control which scenery is used in a region.
trans-unit.target: Um manuell heruntergeladene Szenerie zu nutzen, muss FlightGear deren Verzeichnis(se) kennen. Bitte die Reihenfolge der Liste anpassen, um zu steuern, welche Szenerie wo genutzt werden soll.

trans-unit.source: Remove the scenery folder: '%1' from the list? (The folder contents will not be changed)
trans-unit.target: Verzeichnis '%1' aus Liste entfernen? (Der Inhalt des Verzeichnisses wird nicht geändert)

trans-unit.source: No custom scenery paths are configured.
trans-unit.target: Es sind keine benutzerdefinierten Szenerie-Verzeichnisse konfiguriert.

trans-unit.source: If you have downloaded scenery manually from the official FlightGear website, you can use this button to extract and install it into a suitable folder. (Scenery downloaded this way should have a file name such as 'w40n020.tar.gz')
trans-unit.target: Falls Du manuell Szenerie von der FlightGear Webseite heruntergeladen hast, kannst Du diesen Knopf benutzen, um sie zu installieren. (Szeneriearchive sollten einen Dateinamen ähnlich wie "w40n020.tar.gz" haben.)

trans-unit.source: Click here to mark this as a favourite aircraft
Are you sure you want to uninstall this aircraft?
trans-unit.target: Möchtest Du dieses Flugzeug wirklich deinstallieren?

trans-unit.source: Problems occurred loading the user interface. This is often due to missing modules on your system. Please report this error to the FlightGear developer list or forum, and take care to mention your system distribution, etc. Please also include the information provided below.

alt-trans.source: Problems occurred loading the user interface. This is often due to missing modules on your system. Please report this error to the FlightGear developer list or forum, and take care to mention your system distribution, etc. Please also include the information provided below.
alt-trans.target: Problem beim Laden der Benutzerschnittstelle. Dies kann an fehlenden Modulen auf Deinem System liegen. Bitte berichte diesen Fehler an die FlightGear-Entwickler Mainlingliste oder im Forum unter Angabe Deines Betriebssystems mit Version. Bitte füge die Informationen hinzu, die unten angezeigt werden.

trans-unit.source: FlightGear can send crash and error reports to the development team. This helps to fix common problems and improve the software for everyone. The reports don't contain personal information, but depending on the problem, may contain information such as the aircraft in use, startup airport, or your graphics card.
trans-unit.target: FlightGear kann Absturz- und Fehlerberichte an das Entwicklerteam senden. Dies hilft, Probleme zu beheben und die Software für alle besser zu machen. Die Berichte enthalten keine persönlichen Daten, können aber (je nach Problem) Informationen zum benutzten Flugzeug, Flughafen oder der Grafikkarte enthalten.

trans-unit.source: This hangar is not compatible with this version of FlightGear
This hangar is currently disabled due to a problem. Click here to try updating the hangar information from the server. (An Internet connection is required for this)
trans-unit.target: Dieser Hangar ist auf Grund eines Problems gerade deaktiviert. Hier klicken, um den Hangar zu aktualisieren (erfordert Internetverbindung).

trans-unit.source: Remove this hangar? (Downloaded aircraft will be deleted from your computer)
trans-unit.target: Diesen Hangar entfernen? (Heruntergeladene Flugzeuge werden von Deinem Computer gelöscht!)

trans-unit.source: Select the time of day used when the simulator starts, or enter a custom date and time.
trans-unit.target: Wähle die Tageszeit bei Simulatorstart oder gib ein Datum und Zeit ein

trans-unit.source: Enter a date and time to begin the flight at. By default this is in local time for the chosen starting location - use the option below to request a time in GMT / UTC.
trans-unit.target: Gib ein Datum und eine Uhrzeit ein, zu der der Flug beginnen soll. Standard ist die Ortszeit für die gewählte Startposition. Nutze die Option unten, um eine Zeit in GMT/UTC anzufordern.

trans-unit.source: Select if normal (summer) or winter textures are used for the scenery. This does not affect other aspects of the simulation at present, such as icing or weather simulation
trans-unit.target: Wähle, ob Texturen für den Sommer oder Winter für die Szenerie genutzt werden sollen. Dies beeinflusst derzeit keine anderen Aspekte der Simulation wie Vereisung oder Wetter.

trans-unit.source: Detailed weather simulation based on local terrain and atmospheric simulation. Note that using advanced weather with real-world weather data (METAR) information may not show exactly the conditions recorded, and is not recommended for multi-player flight since the weather simulation is not shared over the network.
trans-unit.target: Detaillierte Wettersimulation basierend auf lokalem Terrain und Atmospherensimulation. Hinweis: "Verbessertes Wettermodell" zusammen mit "reales Wetter" ergibt nicht zwingend das genaue Wetter und sollte nicht im multi-player benutzt werden, da die Wettersimulation nicht über das Netzwerk übertragen wird.

trans-unit.source: Download real-world weather from the NOAA servers based on location.
trans-unit.target: Aktuelle Wetterdaten für Standort im Simulator von NOAA Servern herunterladen.

trans-unit.source: Enter a custom METAR string, e.g: '%1'
The entered METAR string doesn't seem to be valid.
trans-unit.target: Der eingegebene METAR scheint ungültig zu sein.

trans-unit.source: The flight-plan departure airport (%1) is different to the initial location (%2). Click here to set the initial location to the flight-plan's airport.
Location page disabled due to conflicting user arguments (in Settings)
Search for an airport or navaid
View available aircraft carriers to start at.
Enter the name, partial name or ident of a navaid or fix, or an airport name or ICAO identifier. Alternatively, enter a latitude & longitude: for example 53.4,-3.4 or 18.4S, 87.23W
trans-unit.target: Name oder Teil des Names, ID, Fix, Flugplatzname oder ICAO Code. Alternativ: Breite und Länge eingeben, z.B. 53.4,-3.4 or 18.4S, 87.23W

trans-unit.source: Tune navigation radio (NAV1) to runway localizer

The official FlightGear aircraft hangar is not added, so many standard aircraft will not be available. You can add the hangar now, or hide this message. The offical hangar can always be restored from the 'Add-Ons' page.
trans-unit.target: Der offizielle FlightGear-Hangar wurde nicht hinzugefügt. Viele Standardflugzeuge werden nicht verfügbar sein. Du kannst den Hangar jetzt hinzufügen oder diese Nachricht ausblenden. Der offizielle Hangar kann auf der Seite "Add-Ons" wiederhergestellt werden.

trans-unit.source:
Enter additional command-line arguments if any are required. See here for documentation on possible arguments.
Warning: values entered here always override other settings; click here to view the final set of arguments that will be used

Warning: specifying fg-root, fg-aircraft, fg-scenery or fg-home using this section is not recommended, and may cause problem or prevent the simulator from running. Please use the add-ons page to setup scenery and aircrft directories, and the 'Select data files location' menu item to change the root data directory.

Note: you have entered arguments relating to the startup location below. To prevent problems caused by conflicting settings, the values entered on the location page (for example, airport or altitude) will be ignored.
Enter text here to search for a setting
Automatically pause the simulator when launching. This is useful when starting in the air.

When flying with the mouse, or a joystick lacking a rudder axis, it's difficult to manually coordinate aileron and rudder movements during turn. This option automatically commands the rudder to maintain zero slip angle when banking
Open a console window showing debug output from the application.
Send crash and error reports to the development team for analysis.
Enable simulator & aircraft development features, such as increased error messages in log files.

FlightGear supporters maintain a network of servers to enable global multi-user flight. This requires a moderately fast Internet connection to be usable. Your aircraft will be visible to other users online, and you will see their aircraft.
Enter a callsign you will use online. This is visible to all users and is how ATC services and other pilots will refer to you. (Maximum of seven characters permitted)
Select a server close to you for better responsiveness and reduced lag when flying online.
Enter a server hostname or IP address, and optionally a port number. (Default port is 5000) For example 'localhost:5001'
FlightGear can automatically download scenery as needed, and check for updates to the scenery. If you disable this option, you will need to download & install scenery using an alternative method.

FlightGear stores downloaded files (scenery and aircraft) in this location. Depending on your settings, it may grow to a considerable size (many gigabytes). If you change the download location, files will need to be downloaded again. When changing this setting, FlightGear will restart to use the new location correctly.
Choose a location to store download files.
Start the simulator in full-screen mode.
Select the initial size of the window (this has no effect in full-screen mode).
Enter a custom window size in the form 'WWWWW x HHHHH', for example '1280 x 900'
The low-spec renderer ensures maximum performance on older computers.
The default renderer provides standard visuals with maximum compatibility.
The ALS renderer uses a sophisticated physical atmospheric model and several other effects to give realistic rendering of large distances.

Rembrandt is a configurable multi-pass renderer which supports shadow-maps, cinematic effects and more. However, not all aircraft appear correctly and performance will depend greatly on your system hardware.
Anti-aliasing is disabled when Rembrandt is enabled.
Anti-aliasing improves the appearance of high-contrast edges and lines. This is especially noticeable on sloping or diagonal edges. Higher settings can reduce performance.

By converting images used in rendering to an optimised format loading times and memory use can be improved. This will consume some disk space and take initial time while images are converted, but subsequent loads will be faster, and use less memory.
The selected aircraft is not installed or has updates pending
trans-unit.target: Das gewählte Flugzeug ist nicht installiert oder hat ausstehende Aktualisierungen

trans-unit.source: %1 aircraft have updates available - download and install them now?
trans-unit.target: %1 Flugzeug(e) haben Aktualisierungen - jetzt herunterladen und installieren?

trans-unit.source: This copy of FlightGear does not include the base data files. Please select a suitable folder containing a previously download set of files.
trans-unit.target: Diese Kopie von FlightGear enthält nicht das Basisdatenpaket. Bitte wähle ein Verzeichnis, in das diese Daten bereits heruntergeladen wurden.

trans-unit.source: The requested location '%1' does not appear to be a valid set of data files for FlightGear
trans-unit.target: Das Verzeichnis '%1' scheint keine gültigen Daten für FlightGear zu enthalten

trans-unit.source: Detected incompatible version of the data files: version %1 found, but this is FlightGear %2. (At location: '%3') Please install or select a matching set of data files.
trans-unit.target: Inkompatible Datenversion erkannt: gefunden wurde %1, aber diese Version von FlightGear braucht %2 (Verzeichnis '%3') Bitte installiere oder wähle eine passende Version der Daten.

trans-unit.source: Please select or download a copy of the FlightGear data files.
trans-unit.target: Bitte wähle oder downloade eine Kopie der FlightGear Datendateien.

trans-unit.source: The choosen location (%1) does not appear to contain FlightGear data files. Please try another location.
trans-unit.target: Das gewählte Verzeichnis (%1) enthält keine Daten für FlightGear. Bitte wähle ein anderes Verzeichnis.

trans-unit.source: The choosen location (%1) contains files for version %2, but this is FlightGear %3. Please update or try another location
trans-unit.target: Das gewählte Verzeichnis (%1) enthält Daten für Version %2, aber dies ist FlightGear %3. Bitte aktualisiere die Daten oder wähle ein anderes Verzeichnis.

trans-unit.source: Package file missing from download server

trans-unit.note: does this refer to a number?
does this refer to a number or name?

trans-unit.source: The catalog data was not found on the server at the expected location (URL)
trans-unit.target: Der Katalog wurde auf dem Server nicht an der erwarteten Stelle gefunden.

trans-unit.source: The catalog is not compatible with the version of FlightGear

alt-trans.source: The catalog is not comaptible with the version of FlightGear
alt-trans.target: Der Katalog ist nicht kompatibel mit dieser Version von FlightGear

trans-unit.source: The catalog server is blocking access from some reason (forbidden)
disabled due to an internal error
(will be skipped due to being specified as an additional argument)

trans-unit.target: Optionen, die als weitere Argumente gesetzt wurden:

trans-unit.source: The selected location for downloads does not exist. (%1) Create it?
trans-unit.target: Das gewählte Verzeichnis für Downloads existiert nicht. (%1) Soll es jetzt angelegt werden?

trans-unit.source: An error occurred installing the aircraft %1: %2
trans-unit.target: Bei der Installation des Flugzeugs %1 ist ein Fehler aufgetreten: %2
Alle Einstellungen auf den Standard zurücksetzen?

trans-unit.source: Restoring settings to their defaults may affect available add-ons such as scenery or aircraft.
trans-unit.target: Wiederherstellen der Standardeinstellungen könnte die verfügbaren Add-Ons, Szenerie oder Flugzeuge beeinflussen.

trans-unit.source: Currently the built-in data files are being used
trans-unit.target: Momentan werden die mitgelieferten Datendateien benutzt

trans-unit.source: Change the data files used by FlightGear?
trans-unit.target: Möchtest Du die Datendateien ändern, die FlightGear nutzt?

trans-unit.source: FlightGear requires additional files to operate. (Also called the base package, or fg-data) You can restart FlightGear and choose a different data files location, or restore the default setting. %1
trans-unit.target: FlightGear benötigt zum Betrieb weitere Dateien (auch base package oder fg-data genannt). Du kannst FlightGear neustarten und einen anderen Ort für die Datendateien wählen oder die Standardeinstellungen wiederherstellen. %1

trans-unit.source: Problems occurred loading the user interface. This is usually due to missing modules on your system. Please report this error to the FlightGear developer list or forum, and take care to mention your system distribution, etc. Please also include the information provided below.

trans-unit.target: im %1-Landmeilen Endanflug auf die aktive Piste

trans-unit.source: Initialising navigation data, this may take several minutes
trans-unit.target: Initialisiere Navigationsdaten, dies kann mehrere Minuten dauern

trans-unit.source: Another copy of FlightGear is creating the navigation database. Waiting for it to finish.
FlightGear has detected another copy is already running. This copy will run in read-only mode, so downloads will not be possible, and settings will not be saved.
trans-unit.target: FlightGear hat festgestellt, dass bereits eine FlightGear Instanz läuft. Diese Instanz wird im nur-lese-Modus laufen, Downloads sind nicht möglich und Einstellungen werden nicht gespeichert.

trans-unit.source: If you are sure another copy is not running on this computer, you can choose to reset the lock file, and run this copy as normal. Alternatively, you can close this copy of the software.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Du sicher bist, dass keine weitere Instanz von FlightGear läuft, kannst du die Sperre zurücksetzen und diese Instanz normal laufen lassen. Alternativ kannst du diese Instanz beenden.

trans-unit.source: FlightGear is running from the download image. For better performance and to avoid potential problems, please copy FlightGear to some other location, such as your desktop or Applications folder.
Welcome to FlightGear, the open source flight simulator. This software is the work of volunteers. We hope you enjoy it. If you find problems or would like to contribute, please visit our forum.

alt-trans.source: Welcome to FlightGear, the open source flight simulator. This software is the work of volunteers. we hope you enjoy it. If you find problems, or would like to contribute, please visit our forum.

trans-unit.source: FlightGear is Free software, licensed under the GNU General Public License. You are free to use, customize and fix the software; and share your changes with the community.

FlightGear can automatically report crashes and errors to the development team, which helps to improve the software for everyone. This reporting is anonymous but contains information such as the aircraft in use, your operating system and graphics driver. You can enable or disable this reporting in the 'Settings' page.
An updated version of the official aircraft hangar '%2' was automatically installed. Existing aircraft have been marked for update, click here to update them all
An updated version of the hangar '%2' was automatically installed. Existing aircraft have been marked for update, click here to update them all
A new release of FlightGear is available (%1): click for more information
Updated version %1 is available: click here to download

FlightGear previously downloaded aircraft and scenery to a folder within your 'Documents' folder. This can cause problems with some security features of Windows, so a new location is now recommended.


To keep your existing aircraft and scenery downloads, please move the files from the old location to the new location
Click here to show advanced settings in this section
